translation.key: Hello, I was sent to you by a carpenter to help you.
translation.value: 你好，我是木匠派来帮助你的

translation.key: **He asks with a smile**: Hello, have you just arrived?
translation.value: **他笑着问**: 你好，你刚刚到吗?

translation.key: Yes, I came to you to become an adventurer, I need money.
translation.value: 是的，我是来帮助你成为探险家的，我需要钱。

translation.key: Well, I'll tell you [Player], things have been very bad here lately, the residents are living in fear. Recently, a little girl was killed, as we understand there is a dead force involved.
translation.value: 好吧, 让我告诉你 [Player], 这里最近很不太平, 居民每天生活在恐惧之中. 就在最近,有一名小女孩也被杀害, 在我们看来，这是一种死亡暴力.

translation.key: **With horror in his eyes**: What ... Dead People
translation.value: **他的眼神带着恐惧**: 什么...... 尸..体...

translation.key: **He said hurriedly**: I don't know for sure. Over time, the residents will tell you everything, or you will feel for yourself what is happening there.
translation.value: **他急忙说**：我不确定。随着时间的推移，居民们会告诉你一切，或者你会自己察觉到那里发生了什么...

translation.key: I didn't expect it to be this bad. Well, what can I help you with?
translation.value: 我没想到会这么糟..那么....我能帮你什么忙吗?

translation.key: Come with me, our guys dropped boards, help me collect them.
translation.value: 跟我来, 我们的伙计掉落了一些板子，请帮我把他们捡回来.

translation.key: Okay generally help me collect all the boards! I will reward you for your help.
translation.value: 好吧，帮我收集所有的板子！ 我会奖励你。

translation.key: **Weakness in asks**: Oh, hell, they're heavy, I've got them all.
translation.value: **虚弱地说**: 哦, 见鬼, 它们很重, 我全拿到了.

translation.key: Great job! Your muscles won't hurt you anyway [Player] *laughter*
translation.value: 干得漂亮”! 反正你不会肌肉拉伤 [Player] *大笑*

translation.key: *laughter*
translation.value: *大笑*

translation.key: Now hand them out to my boys and let them go on with their business.
translation.value: 现在把它们交给我的伙计们，让他们继续他们的工作。

translation.key: Good [Talked]!
translation.value: 很好 [Talked]!

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Here you go, your boss told me to give it to you!
translation.value: 给你，你老板叫我把它给你！

translation.key: Thanks for the help.
translation.value: 谢谢你的帮助，你和Moker（翻译者JiaDaiSiHuo）一样乐于助人.

translation.key: Is tired. But I did it!
translation.value: 虽然很累，但终究还是完成了

translation.key: Well done, take this. I think you need it if you're going to be an adventurer. Go straight, and you will go straight to the residents, if you ask where to go.
translation.value: 干得好啊，收下这个。 如果你想成为冒险家，我认为你需要它。 如果你想问接下来去哪，那么直走，你会找到村庄.

translation.key: **With a smile**: Well thank you, good luck with your work!
translation.value: **面带微笑**: 好的我真是谢谢你，祝你工作顺利铁子

translation.key: [Stranger]Hi, my name is [Player], how do I find the nearest village?
translation.value: [陌生人]嗨, 我的名字是 [Player], 请问我怎么找到最近的村庄?

translation.key: **She concerned**: Hello, my name is [Talked].
translation.value: **She concerned**: 你好，我的名字是[Talked].

translation.key: I'll be happy to help you settle in, but could you give my brother a note? He works now on the ship that you arrived on, i could have done it myself, but they won't let me in.
translation.value: 我会很高兴帮你搬到这儿来, 但你能不能帮我把这份笔记捎给我的哥哥? 他现在在你去过的那艘大船上工作.本来我可以自己去做，但是他们不让我进去.

translation.key: Yes, of course i help, will you be here [Talked]?
translation.value: 那当然，我会帮你的，你会在这等我吗？

translation.key: I'll be here waiting!
translation.value: 嗯，我会在这等!

translation.key: Hello, are you Diana's brother?
translation.value: 你好，你就是戴安娜的哥哥吧?

translation.key: **He said rudely**: Yes. Did something happen to her?..
translation.value: **他粗鲁地说**: 是我，她怎么了..

translation.key: No, don't worry, she just asked me to pass you the notebook.
translation.value: 别担心，她很好.她让我来给你递个本子

translation.key: Well, thank you very much, and tell her I'll be seeing her this evening.
translation.value: 好的，谢谢你嘞，顺便帮我转告她我我今晚会过去找她。

translation.key: Yes, good luck with your work!
translation.value: 是的，祝你工作和Flower一样顺利！

translation.key: **She says impatiently**: Oh, you're already here, you're fast!
translation.value: **她不耐烦地说**: 哦, 你早就到了, 真快!

translation.key: Really?
translation.value: 真的吗?

translation.key: Yes. How is he?
translation.value: 是的. 他怎么样?

translation.key: He told me that he is busy now, and will visit you later in the evening!
translation.value: 他告诉我他现在很忙，晚上会来看你的！

translation.key: [Player], do you have any questions? I'm sorry, can't help you.
translation.value: [Player], 你有什么问题吗？很抱歉，我不能帮助你.

translation.key: What a beautiful [Time]. I don't have anything for you [Player].
translation.value: 这真是个好天气. 我没有什么能给你 [Player].

translation.key: [Player] are you interested something? I'm sorry, don't want to talk right now.
translation.value: [Player] 你是对什么东西很好奇吗？我很抱歉，我现在不想谈话

translation.key: I'm so happy! They won't let me in because of the problems that are happening. Dead men kidnap girls, and then they find them dead.
translation.value: 太好了，他们不让我过去因为最近发生的事.死神绑架了她们，她们后来都被发现已经死了

translation.key: **He sounds surprised**: Only girls? Why the dead?
translation.value: **他的声音听上去很惊喜**: 只有女孩？为什么是死人？

translation.key: **She's upset**: Honestly, I don't know. The dead or who it is, our headman says that most likely the dead ;(
translation.value: **她很难过**：老实说，我不知道死者是谁，我们的头目这么说 ;(

translation.key: I came to you to become an adventurer, as I know you have magical creatures.
translation.value: 我来找你是为了成为一名冒险家，因为我知道你有魔法制成的产物.

translation.key: **She sounds like she knows it**: An adventurer? We have a Guild of adventurers, but to become an adventurer you need to pass the tests.
translation.value: **听起来她好像知道**：一个冒险家？我们有一个冒险家协会，但要成为一名冒险家，你需要通过测试。

translation.key: Yes the test [Player]. First, you will need to collect the minimum equipment. To apply and pay the fee. And only after that you will be assigned the position of adventurer.
translation.value: 是的没错，一个测试[Player]. 首先, 你需要至少收集一些最垃圾的装备. 申请并支付费用. 然后你才会有资格成为冒险家.

translation.key: Is everything so strict? Yes, I think I can handle it.
translation.value: 这会很难吗？不过我想对我来说应该小菜一碟

translation.key: All right come on I'll show you our village [Player].
translation.value: 好的，跟我来吧。我带你在我们村庄溜一圈[Player].

translation.key: Yes come on ;)
translation.value: 我已经迫不及待了;)

translation.key: **She made it sound like there was something wrong with them**: Oh, my God, where are the slime from?.
translation.value: **她很不可思议地说**: WTF,这你妈的史莱姆是哪来的？

translation.key: I don't know [Talked], here even have slimes. Wahoo
translation.value: 我也不知道啊 [Talked], 这里甚至有史莱姆。 芜湖!

translation.key: Well, Yes [Player], but now they are becoming more frequent
translation.value: 确实 [Player], 但现在他们出现地越来越频繁

translation.key: **You speak proudly**: All right [Talked], I'll clear the way!
translation.value: **你自豪地说**: 没办法了[Talked], 只能露一手了!

translation.key: **You said in disgust**: Phew, the slime is so disgusting...
translation.value: **你厌恶地说**: 呕，这史莱姆好恶心...

translation.key: **She says with a smile**: Well you could use a bath [Player] ;)
translation.value: **她面带微笑**: 你可以洗个澡了 [Player] ;)

translation.key: I will not refuse such an honor ;)
translation.value: 不胜感激 ;)

translation.key: Ah here is and decided, we'll get there I'll show you where I live. And I'll introduce you to the places. And you wash :)
translation.value: 啊，好吧，我们去我住的地方吧。 我会向你介绍那些地方。 然后你可以去洗澡了:)

translation.key: All right, shall we continue on our way?
translation.value: 行吧，那现在我们可以继续出发了吗

translation.key: Yes let's go
translation.value: 当然，走吧.

translation.key: **He said with surprise**: Did you defeat the slugs on the instructions of our master? Take this the master asked me to give you.
translation.value: **他惊讶地说**: 你按照我们主人的吩咐打败了史莱姆? 拿着这个，我们主人让我给你的

translation.key: Yes, I could. They were very slippery.
translation.value: 是的我做到了，它们真的又黏又滑.

translation.key: Hehe.. What did you think?
translation.value: 哈哈..你会怎么想？

translation.key: Well, not so difficult, at the same time I warmed up.
translation.value: 还好，不算太难，只算给我热热身

translation.key: Okay I need to serve, good luck to you, don't give up ;)
translation.value: 好的，我需要上报，祝你好运， 不要放弃！ ;)

translation.key: **She said very rudely**: Who the hell are you? What do you want?
translation.value: **她粗鲁地说**: 见鬼，你是谁，想干嘛

translation.key: Do you know that your father is looking for you?
translation.value: 你知道你的爸爸一直在找你吗?

translation.key: I hate this old guy, he doesn't have time for me......
translation.value: 我讨厌这老家伙，他根本不肯陪我

translation.key: He can only go there. Do it. And we can't spend time together...
translation.value: 他可以只去哪里！ 做他的事！ 却不能花点时间陪陪我...呜呜....

translation.key: Enrages...
translation.value: 生气...

translation.key: Calm down let's go back together and tell him everything? Maybe he just cares about you like that.
translation.value: 冷静下来，我们一起回去和他好好说？ 可能他就是以这种方式关心你。.

translation.key: All right, let's go back.
translation.value: 行吧，我们走.

translation.key: Are you ready?
translation.value: 你准备好了吗?

translation.key: Yes..
So where was she?.
translation.value: 所以，她在哪?.

translation.key: You just don't get angry, everything's fine!
translation.value: 你只要不生气，事情会好起来的

translation.key: In fact, she didn't want to come back, she was offended that you weren't spending time together. You can't rest.
translation.value: 事实上，她不想回来，你没有花时间陪她，她很生气. 你不能休息.

translation.key: Damn why didn't she ask for it herself? Okay, don't worry thanks for the work :) Everything will be fine, we will decide something with daughter
translation.value: 该死的，她为什么不自己说呢？ 好的，别担心，谢谢你的帮助:) 一切都会好起来的，我们会和女儿一起决定的

translation.key: Well, nice :) Good luck to you
translation.value: 那么, 很好 :) 祝你好运

translation.key: To extract any ore [Player], you will need a pickaxe.
translation.value: 在挖任何矿物之前[Player], 你需要一把镐子.

translation.key: You can only get it by creating. But in some cases merchants can sell.
translation.value: 你只能通过合成来获得它。但是在某些情况下，商人会出售.

translation.key: Also, the picks have a durability of 100-0. If you durability reach 0. Don't worry it won't break.
translation.value: 并且，稿子是有耐久的，当它的耐久达到0的时候，他会无法工作，但别担心，它不会被销毁

translation.key: But you can't work with break pickaxe it. You can repair it at any store.
translation.value: 但是你不可以用坏掉的稿子，你可以在任何商店修复它

translation.key: You can also improve picks this will depend on their effectiveness.
translation.value: 你也可以通过提高镐子的效率提升矿物获取量.

translation.key: Each ore has its own strength. If you have a weak pick and the strength of the ore is high, it can take a long time to extract it. So don't forget about the improvements. Or craft even better picks.
translation.value: 每一种矿物都有它自己的硬度。如果你的镐很逊，而矿物的硬度很高，那么挖取它可能需要很长时间，所以不要忘记改进，或者制作更好的镐。

translation.key: Everything is clearly explained, I will not repeat it again, if you need you will understand everything!
translation.value: 所有事项我都说清楚了!我不会再重复，你需要自己把它们消化理解

translation.key: Yes of course thank you for the explanation
translation.value: 当然，谢谢你的解释

translation.key: Well don't worry, I'll give you a couple of tasks to get used to in this area
translation.value: 当然不用担心，我会给你一些任务让你适应这个领域

translation.key: Did you want something?
translation.value: 你需要什么吗

translation.key: I think it's time for you to get your first pickaxe.
translation.value: 我认为你是时候去打造你的第一把镐子了.

translation.key: I think as crafted something, you don't need to explain!
translation.value: 合成这种事，就不用你解释了

translation.key: So let's get right to the point, try to make a pickaxe bring it to me, I'll look at it.
translation.value: 让我们进入正题，试着合成一把稿子带给我，我来康康

translation.key: Done. (you need to have an idea of how to craft items, you can see them near Craftsman in votes)
translation.value: 结束. (你需要知道如何合成物品，在合成商人附近打开投票菜单即可)

translation.key: Well, it's not bad, so use it for the first time.
translation.value: 嗯，还行，拿去试试挖矿吧

translation.key: All right so let's start with your first ore?
translation.value: 那好，让我们开始你的第一次挖矿之旅?

translation.key: Well, as [Player], passed customs?
translation.value: 那么, [Player], 通过海关?

translation.key: Yes [Talked]. He was very rude.
translation.value: 是的 [Talked]. 他非常粗鲁.

translation.key: Well, you have to understand that we also have a lot of problems lately, too many monsters, problems with kidnappings.
translation.value: 嗯，你必须明白，我们最近也有很多问题，太多的怪物，绑架的问题.

translation.key: Come on, show me [Here] seats!
translation.value: 来吧, 给我看看 [Here] 椅子!

translation.key: Oh sure. By the way, in our village, the chief Apostle.
translation.value: 好的. 顺带一提，在我们村子里, 首席使徒.

translation.key: Wait an Apostle? They are ancient beings sent by the gods. Do they exist?
translation.value: 等等，你说使徒? 他们是传说中上帝派来的古代生物. 真的存在吗?

translation.key: Yes [Player]. They exist to keep order.
translation.value: 是的 [Player] ，他们的存在是为了维护秩序。

translation.key: Okay [Player] let's go and show you our [Here]
translation.value: 好吧 [Player] 走，我带你瞧瞧 [Here]

translation.key: **She said with a smile**: Here, you can do a craft items, make your own equipment potions, or what to eat.
translation.value: **她面带微笑**: 在这里，你可以合成物品，也可以合成药水或者什么其他吃的玩意.

translation.key: [Player] even if you provide items, the craftsman you must pay for the use of the equipment
translation.value: [Player] 即使你提供了材料，你依然需要向合成商人支付装备的使用费用。

translation.key: Yes I think I can use it. Thanks for the explanation!
translation.value: 我想我明白该怎么做了.谢谢你的讲解。

translation.key: Let's move on!
translation.value: 行动起来吧!

translation.key: Yes let's go :)
translation.value: 冲冲冲:)

translation.key: So here we have someone's house.
translation.value: 这里，是一些屋.

translation.key: You can also buy houses, decorate them or use the safety Deposit box.
translation.value: 你可以买下一个房子（价格不菲），捐赠或者使用其中的安全存款箱子（工会基金）

translation.key: Sounds good [Talked]!
translation.value: 听起来很不错 [Talked]!

translation.key: **She likes to talk**: Well, okay, let's move on!
translation.value: **他很喜欢说话**: 那么, 好, 我们继续前进吧!

translation.key: This is the ether, it allows you to use instantaneous movement around the world.
translation.value: 这是以太，他可以帮助你进行世界旅行.

translation.key: But only there in the area where you have already visited.
translation.value: 但是只能旅行到你已经到达过的区域.

translation.key: Is it free [Talked]?
translation.value: 这是免费的吗 [Talked]?

translation.key: Not always, there is nothing free in our world!
translation.value: 并不是，在我们的世界没有东西是免费的!

translation.key: **Apparently she didn't like something**: Okay [Player] let's move on!
translation.value: **很显然她不喜欢这玩意**: 好的[Player] 让我们继续!

translation.key: Yes let's go [Talked]!
translation.value: 好，冲冲冲 [Talked]!

translation.key: Here you will be able to raise his skills adventurer, to explore something new. Our world is divided into 3 classes (Healer, Tank, DPS)
translation.value: 探险家，在这里你可以进行升级，去探索一些新的东西。我们的世界有3个职业  (奶妈, 坦克, 输出)

translation.key: So I can become something?
translation.value: 所以我可以成为这个角色?

translation.key: [Player], you can be anyone you want (as well as fine-tune your game mode)
translation.value: [Player], 你可以是任何人只要你想（也可以微调你的游戏模式）

translation.key: [Talked] so I can be both a Tank and a Defender?
translation.value: [Talked] 所以我可以同时是坦克和输出?

translation.key: Yes quite but do not forget about the main characteristics (Strength, Hardness, idk)
translation.value: 是的，但别忘了你的主要角色(力量， 生命值, 或者什么别的)

translation.key: Thank you for a clear explanation :)
translation.value: 谢谢你的解释 :)

translation.key: That's a small part of what I've been able to tell you.
translation.value: 这只是我要告诉你的知识里很小的一部分

translation.key: And here, you will be treated.
translation.value: 在这里，护士姐姐会为你治疗.

translation.key: **She said very jealously**: True, I hate those nurses, all the guys from the village are taken away....
translation.value: **她嫉妒地说**: 是的，我讨厌那些护士，村里所有伙计都被带走了....

translation.key: Don't marry them...
translation.value: 不要娶她们...

translation.key: Yes I will not marry anyone [Talked]! Thanks for the care!
translation.value: 我不会娶任何人的放心吧[Talked]!谢谢你的提醒!

translation.key: **Yawning she said**: Okay I'm tired I'll go home.
translation.value: **她打着哈欠**:我累了，我要先回去了.

translation.key: And you don't disappear, and [Player] go wash up :)
translation.value: 但你不用走，现在，[Player]去洗漱吧:)

translation.key: Well have a good day [Talked] :)
translation.value: 看上去我们过了不错的一天 [Talked] :)

translation.key: Are you ready?
translation.value: 你准备好了吗?

translation.key: What, ready?
translation.value: 什么,什么准备?

translation.key: Introduce you [Player] to the Apostle of our village.
translation.value: 介绍[Player]给我们村里的使徒

translation.key: [Talked] so what's it to them for me?
translation.value: [Talked]他们和我有什么关系?

translation.key: **She said rudely**: No, don't think so bad, they actually think of us as their children.
translation.value: **她粗鲁的说**: 不！别想的那么糟.他们实际上是把我们当成他们孩子的在照顾的.

translation.key: Why so rude? I understand you, okay, I'm worried, but we'll see what happens.
translation.value: 干嘛这么粗鲁? 我了解了, 好吧, 我也很担心, 但是看看会发生什么吧.

translation.key: I'm sorry, but she's really close to me.
translation.value: 好吧..我很抱歉..但是她真的离我有点近了....

translation.key: Are you one of them? Hm...
translation.value: 你是他们中的一员吗? Hm...

translation.key: Fool let's go already.
translation.value: 笨蛋~还不走吗？我们先走了哦~

translation.key: Well ... Let's go
translation.value: 好的... 走吧

translation.key: Well, just don't mess with as a joke, it's Apostle, he is watching over us for many years.
translation.value: 好吧，别开玩笑了，这是使徒，他已经守护我们很多年了.

translation.key: I understand [Talked].
translation.value: 我知道， [Talked].

translation.key: Hello dear Apostle *bowing*. I have come to you to wisdom.
translation.value: 你好，亲爱的使徒*鞠躬*。我来到你这里是为了获得智慧。

translation.key: Hello, lift your head. I knew you'd come. But I'm not sure you're the one I saw.
translation.value: 你好，抬起头来。我就知道你会来的。但我不确定你就是我看到的那个人.

translation.key: See it?
translation.value: 看见了吗?

translation.key: I can't communicate with my brothers and sisters, since our paths have diverged, but we have a common mind.
translation.value: 我无法与我的兄弟姐妹沟通，因为我们的道路不同，但我们有一个共同的想法。

translation.key: I had a vision about a year ago that there would soon be a man who was as tenacious as the Apostles.
translation.value: 大约一年前，我有一个预感，很快就会有一个人像使徒们一样顽强.

translation.key: But in the end, he was going to die. My visions have always come true, but when they will come true is unknown.
translation.value: 但最终，他会死的。我的梦想总是能实现，但何时能实现还不得而知.

translation.key: So please be careful [Player]. I'm worried about everyone, but I've also been weak lately.
translation.value: 所以， [Player]，请小心. 我担心所有人, 但我最近也很虚弱.

translation.key: I .. Not to worry, I can handle it even if I turn out to be one of your visions
translation.value: 我...没什么好担心的，就算我也是你的幻觉之一，我也能应付

translation.key: I hope this is not the case, get used to it, then go to Adventurer Koto.
translation.value: 我希望情况不是这样，习惯它，然后去找冒险家Koto.

translation.key: Thanks a lot.
translation.value: 感激不尽.

translation.key: Hello [Talked], the Apostle sent me to you. I want to be an adventurer!
translation.value: 你好 [Talked], 信徒让我去找你. 我想成为一个冒险家!

translation.key: **He as if he doesn't want me to become an adventurer**: Will you be strong enough? Well, let's see, I think you already understand that you first need to test, only after I say whether you are worthy or not to become an Adventurer?
translation.value: **他好像不想让我成为冒险者一样**：你够坚强吗？ 好吧，你看，我想你已经明白，你首先要测试，然后来看看你是否有成为冒险者的资格？

translation.key: Well, what exactly is required?
translation.value: 好吧，具体需要什么?

translation.key: If you pass my first test, pay the fee, I encourage you, and send you to the exam. And then we will decide whether you are worthy or not
translation.value: 如果你通过我的第一个测试，付钱，我就把你送到第一个测试点然后决定教你值不值得.

translation.key: Okay, where do we start [Talked]?
translation.value: 好吧，我们从什么开始呢 [Talked]?

translation.key: Ha ha where do we start? Don't joke with me young fighter. First, take this and go to the southern part of the village.
translation.value: 哈哈，从哪开始? 别开玩笑了年轻的战士. 首先，带上这个然后去村庄的南边.

translation.key: Well
translation.value: 那么..

translation.key: You did.
translation.value: 你做到了.

translation.key: What could I do?
translation.value: 我应该做什么

translation.key: I thought you were joking, you wouldn't take it seriously, but you came.
translation.value: 我以为你在开玩笑，不会认真对待，结果你还是来了。

translation.key: Well, let's go.
translation.value: 好吧，走吧.

translation.key: Let's go.
translation.value: 走.

translation.key: Why are you shivering [Player]?
translation.value: 你怎么在颤抖[Player]?

translation.key: Am I that scary? Don't worry I'm kind *laughs*. Well, let's see how you cope. Kill for me ....
translation.value: 我有那么可怕吗? 别担心，我很友善的*大笑*. 来吧,让我看看你要怎么对付他们，去把他们杀了 ....

translation.key: I managed it, and it wasn't difficult.
translation.value: 我完成了，说实话，小菜一碟.

translation.key: I noticed how well you did. But don't relax this is just the beginning ^^
translation.value: 嘿！你做的不错.但别放松’注意了 这才只是开始.^^

translation.key: Ah.. Okay [Talked].
translation.value: 额...好哦[Talked].

translation.key: Well today we're finished you can relax. You'll find me as soon as you're ready.
translation.value: 今天就到这里吧，你可以回去休息一下，等你准备好了之后可以再来找我。

translation.key: Okay, well, have a good day.
translation.value: 好的，祝你愉快。

translation.key: Hello, I am the personal Ambassador of the Apostle.
translation.value: 你好，我是使徒大人的私人信使.

translation.key: She wants to see you!
translation.value: 她想见见你!

translation.key: Please follow me to village, I will be waiting for you there
translation.value: 跟我去村庄吧，我会在那里等你

translation.key: Okay, I'm coming
translation.value: 好的.我们走吧

translation.key: Listen there's another request!
translation.value: 听着，这里有另一个任务!

translation.key: [Player] if you find some gel, I'll be happy to exchange them. Brown Slimes,Blue Slimes and Pink Slime drop Gel. You can take your time, i'll wait!
translation.value: [Player] 如果你找到了粘液球,我很乐意拿一些东西来交换.棕色，蓝色和紫色史莱姆会掉落粘液球,你可以慢慢打，我会在这里等你!

translation.key: Here, it wasn't easy but I got it [Talked].
translation.value: 拿着，虽然不是很简单但我还是拿到了[Talked].

translation.key: Thank you very much for your help. All right I'll go back to my post, good luck to you [Player]!
translation.value: 非常感谢你的帮助. 好了我该回到我的岗位了 [Player]!

translation.key: 谢谢你[Talked]
translation.value: Thank's [Talked]

translation.key: [Player] you can go in!
translation.value: [Player]你可以进来了!

translation.key: Well [Talked], thank you for seeing me off!
translation.value: 好的[Talked], 谢谢你为我送行!

translation.key: [Player] first we need to win over the slime. Dirty but necessary.
translation.value: [Player] 首先我们需要战胜这些史莱姆，虽然很脏但是是必须的.

translation.key: I report everything, I coped with the task
translation.value: 我都处理完了

translation.key: Well done, but that's not all.
translation.value: 做得好，但还没结束.

translation.key: Anything else?
translation.value: 还有什么?

translation.key: Yes I think you know about the ethers find me next to him
translation.value: 我想你知道在以太（水晶）旁边可以找到我

translation.key: I think you know that these crystals are actually not just for beauty.
translation.value: 我想你知道这些水晶不是单纯只是好看而已.

translation.key: You use them as a quick transition. But in fact, these are crystals (all the light of good prosperity) precisely because they exist.
translation.value: 你可以通过水晶快速传送到其他世界

translation.key: Me when once before as became defender of the Apostle, I was able to meet with the crystal. Yes, he has a mind. From it warmth on the soul, all the sins immediately fall from the soul. I'm sure you'll meet him one day.
translation.value: 我曾经是水晶的守护者，我可以见到水晶。是的，它有理智。从它热情的灵魂，所有罪恶立即在它面前倒下。我确定你有一天能见到它.

translation.key: Hello, [Player], I am the Chinese translator of MRPG.
translation.value: 你好，[Player], 我是MRPG中文翻译的其中一个人

translation.key: Thanks. I will remember that. (Auther text: This is how the player's rapprochement with the deities began)
translation.value: 谢谢。我会记住的。（作者批注：这就是玩家与神灵怎样建立友好关系的）

translation.key: Well, I'll wait for you in the Apostle's chambers. We will continue the expulsion of the monsters
translation.value: 那么，我会在使徒的屋子里等你。我们会继续驱逐怪物.

translation.key: Our priority is higher now.
translation.value: 我们的优先权现在更高了.

translation.key: [Player] you need to defeat the main slug, in the southern part.
translation.value: [Player] 你得去击败那个主要的鼻涕虫(shengyan)，在南方.

translation.key: That's it, I've met my goal. Clearing dirt.
translation.value: 那就是了。我已经达到了我的目标。清除污垢.

translation.key: Well done, we'll meet again.
translation.value: 干得漂亮，我们会再遇见的.

translation.key: I want to talk to you [Player].
translation.value: 我想跟你谈谈 [Player].

translation.key: I know that your path will not stop here. One day you will become stronger and move on.
translation.value: 我知道你的路途不会终止在这里。总有一天你会变得强大并且离开这里.

translation.key: I have a request to you, if you meet other apostles, it is better to avoid them. Don't trust them, we apostles are not as pure as you think
translation.value: 我有个请求。如果你遇见了别的使徒，最好避开他们。不要相信他们。我们使徒不像你想象的那么纯洁.

translation.key: Maybe you, too, then the enemy really is?
translation.value: 也许你也一样，不过真正的敌人是谁?

translation.key: I don't know *laughter*. The villagers I think will clearly tell you how it really is
translation.value: 我不知道 *大笑*.村民们会告诉你.

translation.key: Diana told me about you in General terms.
translation.value: 丹娜告诉我你一般的地位。

translation.key: **She said it with concern**: You turn out to be a Joker, and a vulgar *laughter*
translation.value: **她关切地说**: 原来你是一个爱开玩笑的粗俗的人 *大笑*

translation.key: No [Talked]......
translation.value: 不是 [Talked]......

translation.key: Always listen to your heart. I think one day you will be able to bring light. But the main thing is perseverance!
translation.value: 永远跟随你的心走。我认为总有一天你会有能力带来光亮和希望。但是最主要的是坚毅的精神和坚持!

translation.key: Do not delay with your title of adventurer. You can go now!
translation.value: 不要为了你冒险家的头衔而停留，你可以现在就走了!

translation.key: I'm trying, thank you very much.
translation.value: 我在尝试，非常感谢你.

translation.key: You look sad today [Talked].
translation.value: 你今天看起来很沮丧 [Talked].

translation.key: Oh man I'm too confused today.... [Player] help me collect lost.
translation.value: 哦...啊我今天太迷糊了.... [Player] 请帮我收集丢失的东西.

translation.key: Take your nose up [Talked], what's wrong with you?
translation.value: 把你的鼻子抬起来 [Talked], 你怎么了?

translation.key: My brother has to stop by today, and I want to cook something to feed him, but everything falls out of my hands..
translation.value: 我的兄弟必须在今天停下了，我想给他煮点东西吃，但是所有事情都超出了我的掌控...

translation.key: So let me help you?
translation.value: 所以让我来帮你?

translation.key: And you I look [Player] today cheerful, well help. I will not remain in debt
translation.value: 你看起来 [Player] 今天你看起来很愉快，会有帮助，我不会继续欠人情.

translation.key: Of course [Talked] ;)
translation.value: 当然 [Talked] ;)

translation.key: Well here's my house! Ah as my not my, father is a master, and even brother. In General, our family
translation.value: 那么这里就是我的房子!啊，不是我的，我的父亲是主人，兄弟也一样;我在我们的家里是一般地位.

translation.key: All right, come on in, I'll cook, and I'll ask you to bring something. All the help me need
translation.value: 好，进来吧。我下厨，我会叫你带些东西过来，所有我需要的会帮助我的东西.

translation.key: I will help you, especially since you are my first close friend in this village, I already trust you, how you can be abandoned.
translation.value: 我会帮助你的.况且你是我在这个村子里的第一个朋友.我很信任你的.你怎么会被抛下呢？.

translation.key: Well [Player], let's get started, little by little
translation.value: 好吧 [Player], 让我们开始吧, 一点一点的

translation.key: Your house comfortable! [Talked]
translation.value: 你的家看起来很舒适!真不错[Talked]

translation.key: Do you really think so? Well thank you.
translation.value: 你真的这么想? 那么谢谢你.

translation.key: All right let's get down to cooking
translation.value: 好了.让我们来做饭吧

translation.key: Well, let's get started [Player]!
translation.value: 好.我们开始吧 [Player]!

translation.key: Oh sure [Talked]
translation.value: 没问题 [Talked]

translation.key: [Player] get me some first, we'll use it as oil
translation.value: [Player]首先拿一些gel给我，我会把他当做油来使用。

translation.key: I think everyone has their own way of making butter *laughter*
translation.value: 我想每个人都有自己独特的黄油制作法吧 *大笑*

translation.key: Yeah you're right, good sense of humor damn *laughter*
translation.value: 你说的没错, 这该死的幽默 *大笑*

translation.key: So now I need meat. How to cook without meat.
translation.value: 现在我需要一些肉. 做饭怎么能少了肉呢.

translation.key: I think you've heard of Kappa, they live near water, their meat is very tasty. So get it for me (you can self find them habitat)
translation.value: 我想你已经听说过kappa, 他们生活在洞穴里靠近水的地方， 他们的肉非常好吃. 所以，去帮我搞一些来吧 (你可以自己找到他们栖息地的)

translation.key: All delicious fine meat, looks great, take it!
translation.value: 这肉非常不错，开始吧

translation.key: Well i let's start cooking :)
translation.value: 好了我要开始烹饪了 :)

translation.key: **You see like she didn't know how to cook**: Are you sure you can cook?
translation.value: **我发觉她好像不会烹饪**: 你确定你会做饭吗?

translation.key: **She said angrily**: You know what I'll tell you [Player]... You don't know how to compliment girls at all..
translation.value: **她生气地说**: 你知道我想说什么吧 [Player]... 你根本不会恭维女孩子..

translation.key: **Someone knocks on the door**: Who could it be? lovers?
translation.value: **有人敲门**: 那是谁? 你的小对象?

translation.key: Oh it's probably my brother.
translation.value: 噢那肯定是我哥哥.

translation.key: **He said angrily and rudely**: Oh, what people, I've seen you somewhere.
translation.value: **他粗鲁地说**: 噢，是你，我在某个地方见过你.

translation.key: You must have imagined it.
translation.value: 你肯定是梦见的吧....

translation.key: Oh well.
translation.value: 啊这

translation.key: [Player] you look sad.
translation.value: [Player] 你看上去很沮丧.

translation.key: Okay [Talked]. I'll probably go extra here
translation.value: 确实[Talked]. 我会更加努力的

translation.key: Yes calm down you why so decided to?
translation.value: 冷静想想你为什么这么决定?

translation.key: Yes, everything is fine. I just have things to do, too. I'll go!
translation.value: 嗯，事情都挺好的，我还有些事要忙，先走了!

translation.key: You offend me [Talked].....
translation.value: 你顶撞我了 [Talked].....

translation.key: Sorry I'm really busy [Talked].
translation.value: 抱歉我真的很忙 [Talked].

translation.key: Well, take care of yourself.
translation.value: 好吧，照顾好自己

translation.key: So let's continue our training.
translation.value: 那让我们继续训练吧.

translation.key: Yes, of course, it's about time!
translation.value: 当然，是时候了!

translation.key: **He speaks rudely**: I don't really like you. But let's see what you can achieve. Let's go back to the Deep Cave.
translation.value: **他粗鲁地说**: 我不是很喜欢你，但还是让我们看看你有什么能耐吧，现在先回去那个深洞

translation.key: **He speaks proudly**: Well, now we have more serious goals.
translation.value: **他自豪地说**: 这次，我们有更难的目标.

translation.key: Exterminate the stronger slime. I'll see.
translation.value: 打败更强大的史莱姆. 我想.

translation.key: Everything is ready, they are vile I do not like slime, maybe something new?
translation.value: 我准备好了, 但是史莱姆真的很恶心我不喜欢它们, 可以换成别的吗?

translation.key: Well, I'll think about your request. Follow me.
translation.value: 我会考虑你的请求的，跟我来.

translation.key: Take it, use it wisely. You will need it very much in the future.
translation.value: 带上这个，明智地使用它，将来你会非常需要它的.

translation.key: **You were surprised by the gift provided**: Oh, thank you very much. Do I owe you something?
translation.value: **你对这突然收到的礼物很惊喜**: 噢，非常感谢,我算不算欠你什么了?

translation.key: I hope you make it to the end, at least I hope you do. I didn't think you'd be Apostle's favorite.
translation.value: 我喜欢你能结束这一切，至少我是这么希望的，但我不认为你是使徒最喜欢的一个.

translation.key: Favorite [Talked]?
translation.value: 最喜欢的[Talked]?

translation.key: **He said very rudely**: I'll go, meet you later.
translation.value: *他粗鲁地说**: 我走了，下次再见

translation.key: Hello [Player]. Are you free?
translation.value: 你好[Player]. 你现在有空吗?

translation.key: Yes, of course. Everything okay?
translation.value: 是的当然，有什么事吗?

translation.key: Apostle asked you to see her!
translation.value: 使徒让你去见她!

translation.key: Well!
translation.value: 好!

translation.key: Thank you, I'm going for a walk!
translation.value: 谢谢，我要去散步了!

translation.key: **She speaks in fear**: Hello [Player]. Today I received news that in the southern part of our village, goblins attacked.
translation.value: **她恐惧地说**: 你好 [Player]. 今天我收到消息，村庄的南部已经受到了哥布林的袭击.

translation.key: And it's not just goblins. This must be the army. The leader brought them.
translation.value: 并且不只是哥布林. 肯定还有军队. 有人带领他们来的.

translation.key: Maybe they kidnapped the residents and terrorized you, and now they decided to attack?
translation.value: 也许是他们绑架了你的居民并恐吓你，但现在他们决定进攻了?

translation.key: I think so too. Anyway, I talked to Koko. About your appointment as an adventurer. We should prepare for resistance. Communication nodes they need to be destroyed
translation.value: 我也是这么想的，无论如何，我会和可可说的，至于你，作为一名冒险家，我们需要守卫我们的居民，我们需要摧毁他们的通信节点.

translation.key: Well, I did the job [Talked]!
translation.value: 好，让我来吧 [Talked]!

translation.key: Good job thank's, you should meet with Koko, he will explain everything to you, good luck!
translation.value: 非常好，你可以去找可可，他会像你解释一切的，祝你好运!

translation.key: Well, thank you!
translation.value: 好的谢谢!

translation.key: Get ready let's go to the Goblin-occupied zone.
translation.value: 准备好，我们出发前往哥布林占领的区域.

translation.key: I'm ready to sort of out right now.
translation.value: 好了我准备好了

translation.key: Well [Player], you're fun, Yes, but it's worth getting ready.
translation.value: 很好[Player], 你很有趣, 但这确实值得好好准备.

translation.key: Well, what do need [Talked]?
translation.value: 那么,需要做什么[Talked]?

translation.key: I'll be waiting for you next to Craftsman.
translation.value: 我会在合成商人那里等你.

translation.key: So first we need potions.
translation.value: 首先我们需要一些药水.

translation.key: Go get supplies, and at the same time exterminate a few slugs so that we can get there without any problems.
translation.value: 去获取一些物资，同时扫清路上的史莱姆这样我们可以一路畅通无阻.

translation.key: **You sound very tired**: We can all move, but the problem is that I'm tired..
translation.value: **你很疲惫**:我们可以出发了但是我现在很累..

translation.key: Nothing to worry about [Player]. You need to toughen up. All right let's move out.
translation.value: 不必担心 [Player]. 你需要加强锻炼了. 好的现在就出发吧。

translation.key: We'll get to the guard post now. We'll move out there to exterminate the goblins.
translation.value: 我们现在就去哨所。我们会搬到那里去消灭哥布林。

translation.key: Well [Talked].
translation.value: 那么 [Talked].

translation.key: **Grinning**: Huh?
translation.value: **笑嘻嘻**: Huh?

translation.key: We can't heal her..
translation.value: 我们不能治疗她..

translation.key: I don't understand..
translation.value: 我不李姐..

translation.key: Our daughter, Maria.. She's sick!
translation.value: 我们的女儿, Maria... 她生病了!

translation.key: Why don't you take her to the Nurse?!
translation.value: 你为什么不带她去找Nurse呢?!

translation.key: I tried, but she said she can't do anything.. I found something in an old book of mine.. A gel treatment. But I also need Kappa Meat for it..
translation.value: 我找过了, 但她说她也无能为力.我在一本老书里看到一些记载.. 一种gel治疗法. 但同时我还需要一些kappa meat..

translation.key: Tha..nk.. You..
Well.. don't look at me, heal Maria!
translation.value: 那么.. 别看我啊, 治疗Maria!

translation.key: F..Father?
translation.value: 爸..爸爸？

translation.key: MARIA! You're well!
translation.value: MARIA! 你终于好了l!

translation.key: *with joy* Hi, Maria!
translation.value: *带着微笑* Hi, Maria!

translation.key: How can I ever make it up to you?
translation.value: 我要怎么补偿你？

translation.key: Well Sir.. I might need a discount from your old friend, the Craftsman.
translation.value: 是的先生...我想我需要从你的老朋友那里获取一些折扣，也就是Craftsman.

translation.key: Sure, I'll.. let him know you deserve it!
translation.value: 当然, 我会.. 让他知道这是你应得的!

translation.key: Sure..What can I do?
translation.value: 那么，我该怎么做?

translation.key: I heard you helped the craftsman with his deliveries..I have no time for small things like mining cooper, can you do it for me? I have to save the world in the main time..
translation.value: 我听说你帮助过craftsman..我没有多余的时间用在挖矿这种小事上，你可以帮我吗，我必须把我的主要时间用在拯救世界上

translation.key: *a bit angry* Ok, I will do it.
translation.value: *稍微生气* 行吧我会去做的.

translation.key: Oh, it's you kid!
translation.value: 噢，谢谢你，孩子!

translation.key: *you can't control yourself* HEY. I'm NOT A KID!
translation.value: *你终于控制不住自己* 嘿，我!不!是!小!孩!

translation.key: Hey.. easy, just a joke, did you get what I wanted?
translation.value: 嘿..冷静, 只是开玩笑, 你拿到我要的东西了吗

translation.key: Yes.. *puts a heavy cooper bag on Erik's table*
translation.value: 是的. *把一个很重的装满矿物的背包放在Eric的桌子上*

translation.key: Good, now get out of here!
translation.value: 很好，你可以走了!

translation.key: Wait.. YOU NOT GONNA PAY ME??
translation.value: 等等... 你不打算给我什么报酬??

translation.key: Haha! I am messing with you.
translation.value: 哈哈! 你被我耍啦.

translation.key: So can you tell me how you got here?
translation.value: 所以你能告诉我你是怎么到这里来的吗?

translation.key: **He's stuttered**: A long story..
translation.value: **他口齿不清地说**: 这是一个漫长的故事..

translation.key: We tried a new potion mixed with ether, but something went wrong, my hiccups are part of this experiment, and I ended up here after I drank it
translation.value: 我们尝试了一种与以太混合的新药水，但出现了一些问题，我的打嗝也是拜这所赐，然后我喝下了它，最终出现在了这里

translation.key: **Sound in the tablet**: Noctis... Noctiis. Do you hear me?
translation.value: **来自某处的声音**: Noctis... Noctiis. 你能听到吗?

translation.key: **Noctis**: I can hear you, how do I get out of here?
translation.value: **Noctis**:我能听到，我要怎样才能离开这里

translation.key: **Sound in the tablet**: Collect all the fragments that ended up here. The connection is lost....
translation.value: **来自某处的声音**: 你必须搜集到所有的碎片.连线已中断....

translation.key: What were you talking to just now?
translation.value: 你刚刚在说什么?

translation.key: A tablet made from a magic crystal. In General, as I thought I need your help in collecting fragments
translation.value: 一种由魔法水晶制成的台子，言归正传，我想我需要你帮忙收集fragments

translation.key: Of course I'll help
translation.value: 当然我会帮你的

translation.key: Look at what I can give you in return for your help. (Vote menu shop list)
translation.value: 看看我有什么东西能作为回报. (投票菜单商店)

translation.key: Wow, [Talked] where can I find them?
translation.value: Wow, [Talked] 我要如何找到他们呢?

translation.key: In a distorted dimension.
translation.value: 在一个扭曲的维度中.

translation.key: Where is it? How do I get there?
translation.value: 它在哪里?我该怎么去?

translation.key: [Player] way, so we'll be preparing to get there.
translation.value: [Player] 有办法, 让我们准备出发过去.

translation.key: So first [Player], I'll need these things from you. They resonate between our worlds
translation.value: 所以首先 [Player], 我需要这些东西给你，它们在我们的世界之间产生共鸣.

translation.key: Take it [Talked].
translation.value: 带上它 [Talked].

translation.key: Well thank you, it will be a little easier now.
translation.value: 好的谢谢你，这会带来一点帮助

translation.key: **Sound in the tablet**: Noctis. How you to get the fragments we will be able to pick you up.
translation.value: **来自某处的声音**: Noctis. 你弄到碎片后我们会来接你的.

translation.key: **Noctis**: Okay, Sid..
translation.value: **Noctis**:好，Sid..

translation.key: Next thing I need to create a resonance. Bring me these items.
translation.value: 接着，我需要去创建一个共鸣.替我带来这些.

translation.key: Everything is ready?. [Talked] take it
translation.value: 一切准备好了吗?. [Talked] 带上这个

translation.key: [Player] yes.. almost, follow me and we'll start resonating.
translation.value: [Player] 是的..大概，跟我来，我们会启动共鸣.

translation.key: All ready.
translation.value: 准备好了.

translation.key: Resonance received. I will wait for you with fragments
translation.value: 共鸣启动完成，我会等你的碎片.

translation.key: Can come to resonance?
translation.value: 我能来参加这个共鸣吗?

translation.key: Yes. Don't worry nothing will happen to you.
translation.value: 是的。不要担心，没有什么事会发生在你身上.

translation.key: I welcome you [Talked], nice to meet you.
translation.value: 欢迎你 [Talked], 很高兴遇见你.

translation.key: Glad to meet you, i'am [Player]!
translation.value: 很高兴见到你, 我是 [Player]!

translation.key: Him you will spend time here. I have to go to the village.
translation.value: 他会在这里虚度光阴.我得去村庄了.

translation.key: Need to stand on defense in the village, good luck to you I will wait for good news from you.
translation.value: 要防守村庄.祝你好运，我会等你的好消息的.

translation.key: Good luck to you [Talked].
translation.value: 祝你好运 [Talked].

translation.key: I came from a far Eastern country, I have some problems in the country so I need to become stronger.
translation.value: 我来自东方一个遥远的国家，在那个国家我有些问题，所以我需要变得更强大.

translation.key: I came for similar purposes. But I would like to visit your country.
translation.value: 我为了和你相似的目的来.但是我想去你的国家.

translation.key: **He speaks with a smile**: If you wish I will be sailing back soon I can take you with me
translation.value: **他面带微笑**: 如果你想，我很快就会回来，我可以带上你一起去

translation.key: I'd love to, but I don't know, i have here made friends. We'll see.
translation.value: 我非常愿意, 但我不知道,我在这里交了一些朋友. 我们会看到的.

translation.key: Well, if we still live of course. And the got to talking and drive away goblins need.
translation.value: 当然，前提是我们还活着. 先赶走这些哥布林再聊吧.

translation.key: To begin with, we must exterminate many of them as possible. To get to them in zone
translation.value: 首先，我们必须尽可能地消灭他们中的许多人，以便在区域内找到他们

translation.key: **Very tired voice**: [Talked]. I'm so tired, there are so many of them.....
translation.value: **非常疲惫的嗓音**: [Talked]. 我好累啊，它们人太多了......

translation.key: **He sounds very tired**: Yes, I am also very tired, but we have to deal with it.
translation.value: **他的声音听起来非常累**: 是的，我也非常累。但是我们必须得解决它们.

translation.key: All right let's keep going before they pile up again.
translation.value: 好了，快点在他们重新聚集在一起之前继续推进

translation.key: Hmmm.. I see a passageway. I think we can go through there and find out where they're coming from.
translation.value: 嗯...我看到了一个通道. 我认为我们可以穿过这里，找一下出口.

translation.key: I'm worried about something.. Where did this hole?
translation.value: 我有些担心，这个洞是通向哪里的？

translation.key: I don't know either, honestly. Maybe the goblins have dug through and are coming out. In any case we need to find out.
translation.value: 说实话，我也不知道，也许哥布林已经挖通了洞并且正在往外走。不管怎样，我们都得进去看看。

translation.key: I think this is where they live.
translation.value: 我想这就是他们的老巢了。

translation.key: In any case, if we can not cope with them, there is an option to block the way. But I think they'll dig it up again in time.
translation.value: 不管怎样，如果我们无法对付他们的话，我们可以试着把路堵上，不过我想他们又会及时挖开。

translation.key: **In anger**: LET's BREAK UP THESE FREAKS ALREADY...
translation.value: *愤怒**: 让我们把这些怪物都搞定......

translation.key: I'm only for your idea. Let's go!
translation.value: 只能这样了，冲！

translation.key: And here is their leader.
translation.value: 这就是他们的首领。

translation.key: Did we manage?
translation.value: 我们做到了?

translation.key: We don't know yet we need to get out of here....
translation.value: 现在还不知道，我们得先离开这......

translation.key: I'll be waiting for you where we fought the goblins.
translation.value: 我会在我们发现哥布林的地方等你。

translation.key: Finally we got out how do you think we managed?
translation.value: 我们终于出来了，你觉得我们是怎么做到的？

translation.key: I don't know [Player], we have to report this news to the village.
translation.value: 我不知道 [Player], 我们得把这个消息带到村庄里.

translation.key: Well, I think my work here is done [Player].
translation.value: 好了，我想我在这的工作也结束了[Player].

translation.key: Your [Talked] next trip will be to your homeland?
translation.value: 你的[Talked]下一个目的地是你的祖国吗？

translation.key: Yes, I think it's time to go home, I missed it.
translation.value: 是的，我想是时候回家了，我也有点想念她了。

translation.key: Will you take me with you?
translation.value: 你会带上我吗?

translation.key: Yes, of course. Say goodbye to your friends or maybe one of them will go with you?
translation.value: 是的，当然。跟你的朋友说再见，或者他们有人会和你一起去?

translation.key: No, I don't want to expose them to danger.
translation.value: 不.我不想把他们带入危险.

translation.key: Well
translation.value: 那好.

translation.key: Well, goodbye [Talked], I'll keep going. I want to be stronger than I was before.
translation.value: 那好，再见. [Talked],我会一直走.我想要比以前更强大.

translation.key: All right [Player]. Good luck don't forget that we will always be happy to welcome you as a guest ;)
translation.value: 好的 [Player]. 祝你好运，别忘了我们会一直很高兴欢迎你成为我们的客人 ;)

translation.key: Don't forget, don't miss me ;)
translation.value: 别忘了，不要忘记我. ;)

translation.key: Don't worry, Diana is very attached to you. I think she will be offended. Talk to she!
translation.value: 别担心，Diana很喜欢你。我想她会生气的。和她谈谈!

translation.key: Why didn't you tell [Player] me you were going to leave?
translation.value: 你为什么不告诉我， [Player]？ 你要去哪里?

translation.key: I'm Sorry [Talked]. I wanted to tell you..
translation.value: 我很抱歉， [Talked]。我想告诉你的......

translation.key: **She said sadly**: Why? Will you take me with you?
translation.value: **她沮丧地说**：为什么?你会带上我吗?

translation.key: I don't want to put you in danger!
translation.value: 我不想把你卷入危险之中！

translation.key: I want to travel with you!
translation.value: 我想和你一起去！

translation.key: Ok, I'll take you. Now let me to say Yasue San.
translation.value: 好吧，我会带上你。现在让我说山雅秀(Yasue San).

translation.key: **She said joyfully**: True? Thank! ;)
translation.value: **她风趣地说**：真的? 谢谢！ ;)

translation.key: Well, ready to go?
translation.value: 好了，你准备好出发了吗?

translation.key: Yes, will I take Diana with me?
translation.value: 是的，我可以带上Diana吗?

translation.key: Yes, of course, set sail:) I will show you my homeland!
translation.value: 当然，启航:) 我会带你领略我的家乡！

translation.key: **He said surprised**: What a wonderful weather today!
translation.value: **他惊喜地说**：今天天气真好啊！

translation.key: Yes, I think so too.
translation.value: 是的，我也这么想.

translation.key: Well, how do you like on our ship [Player]? Captures the ocean, i think I'll stay here a little longer, it's wonderful here.
translation.value: 嗯，你觉得我们的船怎么样[Player]?我想我会在这里多呆一会儿，这里太棒了 .

translation.key: I also really like it. Okay, I'll go, I wish you a good rest [Talked]!
translation.value: 我也很喜欢。好吧，我得走了，希望你能好好休息 [Talked]!

translation.key: And I wish you good luck too [Player]!
translation.value: 并且祝你好运 [Player]！

translation.key: **He looks very tired**: Very hot, impossible to work.
translation.value: **他看起来很疲惫**：太热了，不可能在这儿工作.

translation.key: Hello, I arrived from a small village beyond the mountains and the ocean, my name is [Player], I have a desire to become an adventurer. But I do not know about this place, could you help me?
translation.value: 你好，我来自山的那边海的那边的一个小村庄，我的名字是[Player]，我渴望成为一名冒险家，但我对这里不是很熟悉，你可以帮助我吗?

translation.key: Hello [Player], Yes of course I will help you, explain where you need to go, but you help my workers, they do not cope at all.
translation.value: 你好 [Player]，没错我可以帮你, 告诉你你应该去哪, 但你得帮帮我的工人们, 他们可完全不会处理。

translation.key: What you need help with, I'm good at dealing with predators without meat you will not leave! *laughter*
translation.value: 你需要什么帮助，我很擅长不用肉和那些食肉动物往来，你不会离开的! *笑*

translation.key: Oh, you're a Joker, no thanks go a little further guys will explain everything to you!
translation.value: 哦,你可真会开玩笑， 不用感谢我， 去找其他伙计们，他们会给你解释一切！

translation.key: OK, thanks!
translation.value: 好的，谢谢！

translation.key: Hey, pst! You, yes, you!
translation.value: 嘿, 嘿！你, 没错, 就是你！

translation.key: Yeah? How can I help?
translation.value: 嗯? 有什么我能做的吗?

translation.key: You cannot help me, kid! I just need...to TEST you, yes...!
translation.value: 你帮不了我，小子！我只是想...测试你，是的没错......！

translation.key: Hi my name is [Player], [Talked] are you working?
translation.value: 你好我的名字是[Player], [Talked]师傅你是干什么的?

translation.key: Hello [Player], Yes, I am on duty as a guard, and I also trade a little
translation.value: 你好 [Player]，没错，我作为一名守卫在值班，同时我也会做点小生意.

translation.key: Can you tell me how difficult it is to get into the service?
translation.value: 你能告诉我参军有多难吗?

translation.key: If that's what you want, it's easy. And if you don't then you won't be able to get in ;)
translation.value: 如果那就是你想要的，那很简单。如果你不想，那么你肯定不能加入 ;)

translation.key: By the way [Player], I need help, there are slugs nearby, again raging, and I can't leave the post. At the same time you will test your skills young adventurer.
translation.value: 顺便说下[Player],我需要你的帮助, 有些鼻涕虫(slug)在附近再次肆虐起来，但我不能离开我的岗位。同时，你也能测试你的技能，年轻的冒险家.

translation.key: Yes, no problem, wait [Talked]!!
translation.value: 好的, 没问题...等等! [Talked]!!

translation.key: **He says with a look of horror on his face**: Help me find my daughter, she went to the village for food and never returned.
translation.value: **他一脸惊恐地说**: 帮我找找我的女儿。她去村里找吃的后就再也没有回来了.

translation.key: To the village? [Talked] Yes of course I will help. That's where I need to go!
translation.value: 去村子? [Talked] 是的，我当然会帮忙。 那也是我要去的地方!

translation.key: Thanks a lot
translation.value: 多谢了。

translation.key: Hello, would you like to learn the basics of mining?
translation.value: 嗨！你想学习挖矿的基础知识吗?

translation.key: Yes, of course, I don't mind
translation.value: 当然，我不介意。

translation.key: All right follow me I'll explain the basics to you!
translation.value: 好吧..跟我来，我会先让你了解一点基础!

translation.key: Hello, and so you're new here?
translation.value: 你好, 所以你是新来的?

translation.key: Yes.
translation.value: 是的。

translation.key: I need to register you. Please introduce yourself, and the purpose of your arrival, and the time you to stay here
translation.value: 我得登记你.。请介绍你自己, 还有你来的目的和停留时间。

translation.key: My name is [Player]. I came here to become an adventurer. I can't tell you the exact time of stay.
translation.value: 我的名字是[Player]。我来这里是为了成为一名冒险家，我无法告知你我具体会待多久。

translation.key: And who for you should know the time of your stay here.
translation.value: 谁会知道你在这待多久。

translation.key: Okay well, I will write you down, in case of violation of the rules of our village, we have every right to prohibit your presence here, and report to superiors.
translation.value: 好吧.你给我听好了。如果你违反了我们村子的规矩.我们有权禁止你到这里.并向上级报告

translation.key: Have a good day!
translation.value: 祝你拥有美好的一天!

translation.key: Thank's [Talked]!
translation.value: 谢了 [Talked]!

translation.key: [Stranger]Greetings, wanderer. *bowing*
translation.value: [Stranger] 你好, 流浪者. *鞠躬*

translation.key: I am the Deputy of the Apostle, and I also protect her.
translation.value: 我是使徒的副手.我的职责是保护使徒.

translation.key: I think you've already heard, that the monsters are raging.
translation.value: 我想你已经听说了.有怪物在肆虐的消息.

translation.key: I have a request for you [Player]
translation.value: 我对你有一个要求 [Player]

translation.key: Which one?
translation.value: 什么要求?

translation.key: Help in the southern part to win over the monsters. We can't drive them away but we can scare them away.
translation.value: 帮助南方战胜怪物. 我们不能赶走它们，但是我们可以吓跑它们.

translation.key: Of course I will.
translation.value: 当然我会的.

translation.key: Thank's [Player]!
translation.value: 谢谢你， [Player]!

translation.key: You look awful today, [Talked]! What happend?
translation.value: 你今天看起来很惊慌, [Talked]! 发生了什么？

translation.key: Oh.. don't you worry about me, boy..
translation.value: 哦.. 你不用担心我, 小子..

translation.key: But I DO worry!
translation.value: 但是我很担心！

translation.key: I'm tired of these fight I have with my wife, it's personal bussiness.
translation.value: 我厌倦了和我妻子的这些争吵.这是我的私事.

translation.key: I didn't want to be a pain to you, Officer. I will leave you to your problems now.
translation.value: 我不想让你这么痛苦.警官.我现在就让你解决你的问题.

translation.key: No! Wait!
translation.value: 不! 等等!

translation.key: Hello [Player], I have come to you from the Final Fantasy universe, my name is [Talked].
translation.value: 你好啊 [Player]. 你怎么弄到碎片我们会来接你的.我的名字是 [Talked]

translation.key: I can't say for sure how long I will be here, but for now I will be happy to know your world, and I will be happy to show my world
translation.value: 当然我会在这里呆多久，但现在我很高兴了解你们的世界，也很高兴展示我的世界

translation.key: Are you serious? Did the author smoke dope?
translation.value: 你认真的? 作者在吸食毒品？

translation.key: Maybe so, I have a couple of things that you can get from me, but not for free. I'll need the fragments I lost
translation.value: 也许是这样，我有些东西你可以从我这里得到，但不是免费的。我需要我丢失的碎片

translation.key: Welcome home, sir! **she made a bow**
translation.value: 欢迎回家, 先生! **她鞠了一躬**
